title: Dvi not supported
body: When im in game , pc keep crashing saying dvi not supported , happened to me 3 times yesterday and now im in low queue priority ... anyway to fix this ?

replies.body: I'm not entirely sure what might be happening if that DVI cord works normally and then randomly says it's not working anymore. This is probably something related to your own pc settings and not League related, but I'm sure our tech guys wouldn't mind trying to help you troubleshoot this over in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
it only happens when i play a game of LoL , doing it multiple times
